wiki.content:
This song, so early in his career, epitomizes Johnny's wizardry with the blues. Here he mixes all the styles of Delta Blues at an alamringly fast pace. Any guitarist would be challenged for the speed and expression in this song. Includes work with the slide guitar as well.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: This song, so early in his career, epitomizes Johnny's wizardry with the blues. Here he mixes all the styles of Delta Blues at an alamringly fast pace. Any guitarist would be challenged for the speed and expression in this song. Includes work with the slide guitar as well.

track.name: Be Careful With a Fool
comments: Ich höre JOHNNY seit 1970 !!! Möge ER uns noch die nächten 100 Jahre noch mit seinem Blues beglücken !
JW rocks with the best of them. He is what you call a real deal when it comes to the blues
back in the 70s when we we would go from job to job. just work long enough to buy tickets to go see Johnny Winter concert. !!!!!! yaaaaaaaa
Einfa gut wie er die Klampfe beherrscht
Habe Johnny mit 14j.(1970) zum ersten mal gehört .Bin seit dem infieziert !!!!!!!!!!!!
Damn, the man turns 70 next year.
As you can see, livin´the blues, is no fun - thanks to women and men , who gave us this music, true, expressing pan, hope and joy
I love it, very zz top sounding i think
now this is what i call blues.
